question: PlastIndia, 10th edition of international plastics exhibition was started in which of the following place of Gujarat?
explanation: PlastIndia, 10th edition of international plastics exhibition, started in Gandhinagar, Gujarat. It is held for 6 days from 7th February 2018 to 12th February 2018. It was inaugurated by Gujarat Chief Minister Vijay Rupani. It is organized by Plastindia Foundation. It has participation from buyers and sellers from nearly 28 countries. New products and technologies are displayed by national and international sellers.
